00020 #include "constraintfixedaxis.h"
00021 #include "simulation.h"

00023 namespace mknix {

00025 ConstraintFixedAxis::ConstraintFixedAxis()
00026  : Constraint()
00027 {
00028 }
00029 
00030 
00031 ConstraintFixedAxis::ConstraintFixedAxis( Node* a_in, Node* b_in, std::string& axisName_in, double& alpha_in, std::string& method_in )
00032   : Constraint(alpha_in, method_in)
00033   , axisName(axisName_in)
00034 {
00035   nodes.push_back( a_in );
00036   nodes.push_back( b_in );
00037 
00038 //   cout << "node A: " << nodes[0]->getNumber() << endl;
00039 //   cout << "node B: " << nodes[1]->getNumber() << endl;
00040 
00041   if( axisName == "x" || axisName == "X" )
00042     ro = nodes[1]->getx() - nodes[0]->getx() ;
00043   if( axisName == "y" || axisName == "Y" )
00044     ro = nodes[1]->gety() - nodes[0]->gety() ;
00045   if( axisName == "z" || axisName == "Z" )
00046     ro = nodes[1]->getz() - nodes[0]->getz() ;
00047 
00048   this->stiffnessMatrix.resize(2*dim,2*dim);
00049   this->internalForces.resize(2*dim);
00050 
00051   this->lambda.resize(1);
00052   this->lambda[0]=0.0;
00053   this->phi.resize(1);
00054   this->phi_q.resize(1);
00055   this->phi_q[0].resize(2*dim);
00056   this->phi_qq.resize(1);
00057   this->phi_qq[0].resize(2*dim,2*dim);
00058 }
00059

00061 ConstraintFixedAxis::~ConstraintFixedAxis()
00062 {
00063 }
00064 
00065 void ConstraintFixedAxis::calcPhi()
00066 {
00067   if( axisName == "x" || axisName == "X" )
00068     rt = nodes[1]->getx() - nodes[0]->getx() ;
00069   if( axisName == "y" || axisName == "Y" )
00070     rt = nodes[1]->gety() - nodes[0]->gety() ;
00071   if( axisName == "z" || axisName == "Z" )
00072     rt = nodes[1]->getz() - nodes[0]->getz() ;
00073 
00074   this->phi[0] = rt - ro ;
00075 }
00076 
00077 void ConstraintFixedAxis::calcPhiq()
00078 {
00079   if( axisName == "x" || axisName == "X" ){
00080     this->phi_q[0](0) = -1.0 ;
00081     this->phi_q[0](1) = -0.0;
00082     if (dim == 3)
00083       this->phi_q[0](2) = -0.0 ;
00084     this->phi_q[0](dim) = +1.0;
00085     this->phi_q[0](dim+1) = +0.0;
00086     if (dim == 3)
00087       this->phi_q[0](dim+2) = +0.0;
00088   }
00089   else if( axisName == "y" || axisName == "Y" ){
00090     this->phi_q[0](0) = -0.0 ;
00091     this->phi_q[0](1) = -1.0;
00092     if (dim == 3)
00093       this->phi_q[0](2) = -0.0 ;
00094     this->phi_q[0](dim) = +0.0;
00095     this->phi_q[0](dim+1) = +1.0;
00096     if (dim == 3)
00097       this->phi_q[0](dim+2) = +0.0;
00098   }
00099   else if( axisName == "z" || axisName == "Z" ){
00100     this->phi_q[0](0) = -0.0 ;
00101     this->phi_q[0](1) = -0.0;
00102     if (dim == 3)
00103       this->phi_q[0](2) = -1.0 ;
00104     this->phi_q[0](dim) = +0.0;
00105     this->phi_q[0](dim+1) = +0.0;
00106     if (dim == 3)
00107       this->phi_q[0](dim+2) = +1.0;
00108   }
00109 
00110 }

00112 void ConstraintFixedAxis::calcPhiqq()
00113 {
00114 }
